result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

1:12 PM Defendant Carl F. Berning in court.  Attorney Matthew C. Allen in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Morgan Sauder in court for Carl F. Berning.  Atty Sauder requests PLEAS.  Court will set for status to allow judicial transition.

11:08 AM Defendant Carl F. Berning in court.  Attorney Curtis E Johnson in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Morgan Sauder in court for Carl F. Berning.  Offer received but probable it will not be accepted.  Request for additional status.  ADA Johnson advises defendant has not yet been booked.  ADA Johnson requests a $500 cash bond.  Atty Sauder objects and requests further time for booking.  Court will set for review.
Review hearing scheduled for June 10, 2022 at 12:45 pm.  If defendant is not booked by review hearing, a cash bond will be entertained.
Review hearing on June 17, 2022 at 08:00 am.
Booking; no participation in any hunting or taking of wild game.   Defendant is to contact the Iowa County Sheriff's Department at 608-935-3314 to make arrangements for booking by 04/30/2022.

9:05 AM Defendant Carl F. Berning in court.  Attorney Curtis E Johnson in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Morgan Sauder in court for Carl F. Berning.  Court verbally reviews charges/penalties with the defendant. Waiver of formal reading of complaint. Defendant stands mute - not guilty plea entered.  $500 signature bond - no participation in hunting or taking in wildgame.
